question: Who is the author of the book "The Twice-Born - Life and Death on the Ganges"?
explanation: The book \"The Twice-Born - Life and Death on the Ganges\" has been authored by Aatish Taseer, who is son of late Pakistani politician Salman Taseer and Delhi journalist Tavleen Singh. The Twice-Born is a deeply individual and acutely perceptive book revolving around questions of culture and politics that are going to define our future as a nation. It is the remarkable account of a personal journey to understand today\'s India, and truly a book for our times. He is the author of books like \"Stranger to History\", \"The Way Things Were\", \"The Temple-Goers\" and \"Noon\". The book, published by HarperCollins India, will release on October 22.
